headline: Which blogging platform should I use?
description:
I am planning to start blogging but I'm still confused with choosing a blogging platform/CMS. A no code one or one which requires coding knowledge would be OK. What are you guys' suggestions. Need a hand with that. 
What about WordPress, Weebly, Webflow, Ghost, Medium? Is there anything other than that which you found cool?
headline_zh-Hans: 我应该使用哪个博客平台？
headline_zh-Hant: 我應該使用哪個博客平臺？
description_zh-Hans:
我打算开始写博客，但在选择博客平台/CMS方面我还是很困惑。不需要代码的或者需要代码知识的就可以了。你们有什么建议。我需要你们帮帮我。
WordPress, Weebly, Webflow, Ghost, Medium怎么样？除了这些，还有没有其他你觉得不错的？
description_zh-Hant:
我打算開始寫博客，但在選擇博客平臺/CMS方面我還是很困惑。不需要代碼的或者需要代碼知識的就可以了。你們有什麼建議。我需要你們幫幫我。
WordPress, Weebly, Webflow, Ghost, Medium怎麼樣？除了這些，還有沒有其他你覺得不錯的？
